sentences.english: VOICE: Is that why Jesus is sometimes called "the God-man "?
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼耶穌有時被稱爲“神人”？

sentences.english: So they went unto the city where the man of God was.
sentences.chinese: 於是他們往神人所住的城裏去了。

sentences.english: But the hand he stretched out toward the man shriveled up, so that he could not pull it back.
sentences.chinese: 王向神人所伸的手就枯乾了，不能彎回。

sentences.english: How prophet Elisa face the army of Syria by trusting God?
sentences.chinese: 神人以利沙如何靠著神面對亞蘭大軍？

sentences.english: But the word of the LORD came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying.
sentences.chinese: 但耶和華的話臨到神人示瑪雅說。

sentences.english: Jehoram was enraged. He sent messenger to the house of Elisha and wanted the man of God beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 約蘭發怒，差人前往以利沙的家，想要砍下神人的頭。

sentences.english: So they set out for the town where the man of God was.
sentences.chinese: 於是他們往神人所住的城裏去了。

sentences.english: And he answered and said unto him， O man of God， thus hath the king said， Come down quickly.
sentences.chinese: 五十夫長對以利亞說，神人哪，王吩咐你快快下來。

sentences.english: So he went back with him and ate bread in his house and drank water.
sentences.chinese: 於是神人同老先知回去，在他家裏喫飯喝水。

sentences.english: Gehazi came over to push her away, but the man of God said, 'Leave her alone!
sentences.chinese: 基哈西前來要推開她，神人說，由她吧。

sentences.english: Then they took up their regular positions as prescribed in the Law of Moses the man of God.
sentences.chinese: 遵着神人摩西的律法，照例站在自己的地方。

sentences.english: The man of God had replied, 'You will see it with your own eyes, but you will not eat any of it!'
sentences.chinese: 神人說，你必親眼看見，卻不得喫。

sentences.english: Now concerning Moses the man of God， his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
sentences.chinese: 至於神人摩西，他的子孫名字記在利未支派的冊上。

sentences.english: And he spake unto him， Thou man of God， the king hath said， Come down.
sentences.chinese: 五十夫長對他說，神人哪，王吩咐你下來。

sentences.english: The work of gaining salvation is one of copartnership, a joint operation.
sentences.chinese: 得救的工夫乃是一種神人合作共同進行的工夫。

sentences.english: When the servant of the man of God got up and went out early the next morning, an army with horses and chariots had surrounded the city.
sentences.chinese: 神人的僕人清早起來出去，看見車馬軍兵圍困了城。

definition: saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
Second Sage, traditional title of Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] in Confucian studies
